content: People thought that teleportation was impossible, but by the 24th century, teleportation of large objects and even people became common, much like the microwave oven back in the 21st century.
translations: ita:La gente pensava che il teletrasporto fosse impossibile, ma dal 24Â° secolo il teletrasporto di oggetti di grandi dimensi
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by nonong (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
